extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void doQuery(ObjectBinaryTree tree)
      Runs the Query class.
      void makeHashDisplay(ObjectList[] hashTable)
      Loops through the hash table, and the elements' lists to print out the hash tables information
      ObjectList[] makeUnimportantHashTable()
      Scans through a text of words, then uses a hash function to place the words in the correct index of the array.
      ObjectBinaryTree makeWordTreeWithout(ObjectList[] hashTable)
      Looping while scanning a text, it creates word objects, checks to see if the word is unimportant, and if it is important, it is placed into it's correct position in the tree.
      void placeKey(ObjectList[] unimportantHashTable, int hF, java.lang.String temp)
      Adds the String key to the hash table at its hash function integer, also while counting the collisions.
      void print()
      Prints a text scanned, with also the line numbers.

        public ObjectList[] makeUnimportantHashTable()
